GSP28prakp10u:0: oṃ śrīmatprabhākaragurutantradhurandhareṇa mahāmahopādhyāya-śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇapañcikā nyāyasiddhyākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣamasthalaṭipparāyā
GSP28prakp10u:6: kiṃ punasteṣāṃ tatra pramāṇam ? na1008 tāvat pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatāmīkṣituṃ
GSP28prakp10u:8: syādeṣā manīṣā---na kṣaṇikatā nāma bhāvasvabhāvabahirbhāvinī, tena bhāvānubhavādeva pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatāmapi sākṣātkarotīti /
GSP28prakp10u:11: tadiyamapi kṣaṇikatā bhāvasya svabhāvabhūta satī saṃvittimadhirohantī
GSP28prakp10u:13: na ca tathā saṃvidamudīyamānāmudīkṣāmāha iti, kutastasyā bhāvasvabhāvāntarbhāvitā ? kutastarāñca tadavabodhenāvabodhaḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:14: atha manvīran---kṣaṇikatā pratyakṣamīkṣyamāṇāpi1011 na niścayapathamavatīrṇā tenāgṛhītevāvabhāti, tathāpi na 1012tasyāṃ
GSP28prakp10u:19: yatra ca dṛṣṭametaditi pratyayo nodīyate, na
GSP28prakp10u:29: anumānamapi sambandhānusandhānanibandhanaṃ kṣaṇikatāṃ na pakṣīkartuṃ kṣamate, tayā saha kasyacilliṅgasya sambandhabodhavirahāt /
GSP28prakp10u:35: yat sat, tat kṣaṇikam, santaśca sarve bhāvā iti bhāvamātrānubandhini sādhye svabhāvaheturbhavati
GSP28prakp10u:45: te tu nivartamāne sattāmapi nivartayataḥ, vṛkṣatvaṃ śiṃśapātvamiva /
GSP28prakp10u:47: 1023akṣaṇiko hi bhāvor'thakriyājananasvabhāvo vā bhavet ? atatsvabhāvo vā?
GSP28prakp10u:55: syānmatam---samartho 'pi svabhāvato bhāvassahakārisamavadhānavaśena kadācitkaroti, tadabhāvāccānyadā neti /
GSP28prakp10u:57: sa hi sahakārī kiñcidārabhate, na vā ?
GSP28prakp10u:68: tata eva bāhyādāgantorarthakriyodeyaḥ, tadbhāve bhāvāt, tadabhāve cābhāvāt /
GSP28prakp10u:78: nirapekṣasya janakatve, sahakāritāpi tasya kīdṛśīti na karoti /
GSP28prakp10u:79: nirapekṣasya janakatve, sahakāritāpi tasya kīdṛśīti vaktavyam /
GSP28prakp10u:80: atra vadāmaḥ---yattāvadidamuktam---vināpi sahakāribhiḥ kimiti na karotīti
GSP28prakp10u:84: yastvasti, nāsau sa iti, na kiñcit kṣīṇam /
GSP28prakp10u:85: sahakāribhirvinā kimiti na bhavatyeveti paryanuyoge, hetusvabhāvairuttaraṃ
GSP28prakp10u:88: nanu te 'pyanyanirapekṣā eva janakāḥ kimiti na kāryāntaramārabhante /
GSP28prakp10u:89: atrāpi vayamanīśāḥ---bhāvāstu yadārabhante, tadārabhantāmityanumantumeva vayaṃ prabhavāmaḥ
GSP28prakp10u:90: te cāmī janakā api 1034santastadeva janayantīti, paśyatāmasmākaṃ tāvatyevābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:91: nanvekena kṛte, aparaḥ kiṃ karotīti ? bhavedetadevaṃ
GSP28prakp10u:96: anyo 'pīdaṃ kartumasmābhirapi vinā samarthaḥ, vayamiha na prabhavāma iti /
GSP28prakp10u:97: te tu hetvadhīnasannidhānā na bhavituṃ na kṣamanta iti kānupapattiḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:99: kāraṇabheda eva hi kāryasya bhede hetuḥ, anyathā'kasimakatvāpatteḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:100: ucyate, na sahakārikāraṇabhedād bhedaḥ kāryasya, kintu sāmāgrībhedāditi,
GSP28prakp10u:106: api ca pratyabhijñāpratyakṣavirodhe kathamanumānamātmānaṃ labhata ityapi na vācyam /
GSP28prakp10u:108: samādhirabhidhīyate---ye te kṣaṇāḥ, teṣāmātyantikaṃ bhedaṃ susadṛśatayā
GSP28prakp10u:113: ata eva ca vṛddhā vadanti---"bhavati ca pratyakṣādapyanumānaṃ balīya" iti
GSP28prakp10u:115: "tadevedami"tyekavijñānodaye1039 kāraṇābhāvāt1040, indriyaṃ sannihite vyāpriyate, na punaḥ pūrvakālasambandhitā-1041rūpāṃ tattamupaspṛśati,
GSP28prakp10u:118: api ca kṛtakānāṃ bhāvānāmavaśyambhāvī vināśaḥ pratīyate /
GSP28prakp10u:120: tathāhi---yadyeṣāṃ dhruvabhāvinī, tatra teṣāṃ hetvantarāpekṣā nāsti /
GSP28prakp10u:126: ye hi hetvantarapekṣāḥ, te dhruvabhāvino na bhavanti /
GSP28prakp10u:130: tathā yadi bhāvā api svahetubhyo hetvantaraṃ vināśaṃ pratyapekṣeran,
GSP28prakp10u:135: api cedaṃ cintanīyam, kiṃ kṛtakā bhāvāssvahetubhyassamupajāyamānā
GSP28prakp10u:140: sa hi jāyamāno vanāśo bhāvādavyatirekī ? vyatirekī vā /
GSP28prakp10u:143: tena tirodhīyata iti kalpanāyāmapi, tirodhānaṃ pratyeṣaṃ vikalpo vācya1045
GSP28prakp10u:146: atra1046 kecidevaṃ samādadhati---"tadevedami"ti tattedante parasparaṃ saṃvalite samākalayadekaṃ pratyabhijñāsamākhyātaṃ pratyakṣavijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgānumānaṃ niruṇaddhi---iti /
GSP28prakp10u:148: dve ete vijñāne grahaṇa-smaraṇarūpe yathāyathaṃ tattāmātre, idantāmātre ca vyāpriyamāṇe
GSP28prakp10u:150: yarthaiva khalvabhinnadeśakālaṃ vastvekatayā cakāsti, tathā bhinnadeśakālamapyekatayaiva parisphuratīti,
GSP28prakp10u:152: kāryasadbhāvopapādanāyāpratītamapi kāraṇaṃ parikalpanīyam, na punaḥ kāraṇamukhanirīkṣaṇena spaṣṭadṛṣṭakāryaviparyayaḥ paryālocanīyaḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:153: tena yadyapi kavalādindriyāt, kevalāt pūrvānubhavasamāsāditajanmano bhāvanābhidhānāt saṃskārādvā naivaṃvighamidaṃ vijñānumudetumarhati /
GSP28prakp10u:164: abādhitaviṣayatā1050 cāpi kāraṇamanumānodaye, anyathā hutavahe śītatā
GSP28prakp10u:169: tatra jvālādiṣu pratyakṣaṃ sāmānyaviṣayam, anumānantu viśeṣaviṣayamiti,
GSP28prakp10u:172: sa khalu sahakārisamavadhānopahitaviśeṣāṃ bhāvastāṃ tāmarthakriyāṃ krameṇaiva samapādayati
GSP28prakp10u:173: nanu vikalpitaṃ-sahakāribhiḥ kiṃ vyatiriktaḥ, avyatirikte vā viśeṣa
GSP28prakp10u:174: ādhīyata iti, dūṣaṇāni ceha vikalpayugale pūrvamāveditāni /
GSP28prakp10u:176: nedamasmanmatamekāntatobhinnanyeva sarvavastūni, abhinnāni 1052veti, kintu sarvabhāveṣu bhedā-bhedau saṅgirāmahe /
GSP28prakp10u:184: sa hi dadarśa---bhedā-bhedāveva tāvadekatra na sambhavataḥ, virodhāt /
GSP28prakp10u:190: na ca pratyabhijñānenānumānavirodhaḥ,1057 pratyabhijñāyā eva parīkṣaṇīyatvāt /
GSP28prakp10u:192: sā ca sādṛśyavaśena bhedāgrahaṇanibandhanaiveti yuktātrāpi parīkṣā /
GSP28prakp10u:195: bhavati ca vimṛśato 'pi1059 diṅmohādiṣvanumānavaśena jātāyā api
GSP28prakp10u:202: samādhimabhidhati---stambhādiṣu prathamamanubhūteṣu punarantarā tirodhānādivaśena vicchinnopalambheṣu punaranubhavataḥ"sa evāyami"ti
GSP28prakp10u:204: tatra yadyarthakriyā sthirādapi kathañcidupapadyate, tato bhedāgrahaṇanibandhano 'yamabhedavyavahāra iti kimiti kalpyate /
GSP28prakp10u:206: sa ca viśeṣo vyatirikta eva bhāvādarthakriyākāriṇaḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:207: na ca sa evār'thakriyākārī, bhāvastūdāsta iti caturastram /
GSP28prakp10u:213: atha kasmādbhāvasyaiva bhedo nānumīyate, pratyabhijñānānuguṇyāditi vadāmaḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:215: yathā cār'thakriyā dṛśte,1062 tathedamapi dṛśyate sthāvaro bhāva iti,
GSP28prakp10u:226: kaṃ khalu bhavanto vināśamabhimanyante ? pradhvaṃsābhāvo vināśa iti
GSP28prakp10u:227: cet---kaḥ punaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ ?"dadhni kṣīraṃ nāstīstye" vamādikā bhāvaviṣayā saṃviditi vadyucyeta, tadāmṛtakalāyāmuditā
GSP28prakp10u:230: saiva hi payaso nāstitā, yā dṛśye 'pi tasmin dadhisvarūpamātropalabdhiḥ /
GSP28prakp10u:231: na ca tāṃ prati payasa eva nirapekṣasya hetutā, anupanipatite hetvantare,
GSP28prakp10u:233: na cedaṃ payonataramupalabhyata iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP28prakp10u:239: na ca bālā vayaṃ1068 yenaivaṃvidhavādād bhīṣayāmahe /
GSP28prakp10u:241: vināśe, vyatirekiṇi jāte 'pi pūrvavat bhāvasyopalabdhyādiprasaṅga iti /
GSP28prakp10u:248: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikānāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ mīmāṃsājīvarakṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
